name: xPlan Document
summary: Learn about .PJ2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: xPlan allows you to customize different facets of your project including resources, tasks, and scheduled days off. You can also share projects with other users via xPlan's iCloud and Dropbox integration.

description: Project file created by xPlan, a project management program; contains project data such as budget amount, weekly details, milestones reached, and updated progress.
